metadata.title: CVE-2023-28859 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: redis-py before 4.4.4 and 4.5.x before 4.5.4 leaves a connection open aftercanceling an async Redis command at an inopportune time, and can sendresponse data to the client of an unrelated request. (This could, forexample, happen for a non-pipeline operation.) NOTE: the solutions forCVE-2023-28859 address data leakage across AsyncIO connections in general.

criterions.comment: python-redis package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
